text: Ara allahara hukuma chara ke'u marate pare na-sejan'ya ekata samaya nirdharita rayeche. Bastutah ye loka duniyaya binimaya kamana karabe, ami take ta duniyate'i dana karaba. Paksantare-ye loka akherate binimaya kamana karabe, ta theke ami take ta'i debo. Ara yara krtajna taderake ami pratidana debo
